metadata.title: About - Op. Dr. Mahmut Ulvi Kayalı
metadata.description: Who we are, what we do?

qualificationsList.ebopras: European Board of Plastic, Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery (EBOPRAS) qualification diploma (2010); Oral assessment (2010, Bern, Switzerland);
qualificationsList.microsurgery: Şişli Etfal Microsurgery Association Microsurgery Training Certificate (2006).

educationList.residency: 05/2002 – 09/2008 Şişli Etfal Training and Research Hospital, Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery resident.

workExperienceList.current: 2014 – present Private Op. Dr. Mahmut Ulvi Kayalı Office
workExperienceList.stateService: 09/2009 – 05/2011 State Service Obligation at Isparta State Hospital, Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery Specialist
workExperienceList.demiderm: 10/2008 – 10/2009 Demiderm Beauty Center, Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery Specialist
workExperienceList.military: 10/2008 – 09/2009 Izmir Military Hospital, Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery Specialist
workExperienceList.training: 2008, Şişli Etfal Training and Research Hospital Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Specialist

membershipsList.turkish: Turkish Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery Association

list.pub1: 1. Turgut G, Kayalı MU, Köse O, Baş L. "Repair of a wide lower extremity defect with cross-leg free transfer of latissimus dorsi and serratus anterior combined flap: a case report. Strategies Trauma Limb Reconstr". 2010 Dec; 5(3):155-8. Epub 2010 Sep 18.
list.pub2: 2. Karsidag S, Özkaya Ö, Kayalı MU, Doğan H, Kaur AC, Ugurlu K. "Preliminary study on durability of nail as xenograft". J Craniofac Surg. 2010 Nov; 21(6):1843-7.
list.pub3: 3. "A retrospective study on the epidemiology and treatment of maxillofacial fractures". Ozkaya O, Turgut G, KayalI MU, Uğurlu K, Kuran I, Baş L. "Ulus Travma Acil Cerrahi Derg", 2009 May; 15(3).
list.pub4: 4. Tatlidede S, Turgut G, Gönen E, Kayali MU, Baş L. "Stereolithographic volume evaluation of healing and shaping after rhinoplasty operations". J Craniofac Surg. 2009 Jul; 20(4):1082-5.
list.pub5: 5. Turgut G, Ozkaya O, Kayali MU, Tatlidede S, Hüthüt I, Baş L. "Lower Lip Reconstruction With Local Neuromusculocutaneous Advancement Flap". J Plast Reconstr Aesthet Surg. 2009 Sep; 62(9):1196-201. Epub 2008 Nov 22.
list.pub6: 6. Turgut G, Kayali MU, Soydan AT, Gündüz O, Salman S, Oktar F, Baş L. "Biomechanical Comparison Of A New Technique Of Mandibular Angle Fractures: Biplanar And Bicortical Superior Proximal 3 Holes And Bicortical Inferior Plate Fixation". J Craniofac Surg. 2008 Mar; 19(2):428-32. Erratum in: J Craniofac Surg. 2008 May; 19(3):871.
list.pub7: 7. Semra KARŞIDAĞ, Mahmut Ulvi KAYALI, Arzu ÖZCAN, Kemal UĞURLU, Leyla TÜRKOĞLU KILINÇ, Lütfü BAŞ. "Bilateral Medial Uyluk Perforatör Flebi Ile Fournier Gangreni Onarımı". Turk Plast Surg. Cilt 16, Sayı 3 (2008).
list.pub8: 8. Ali Tufan SOYDAN, Mahmut Ulvi KAYALI, Gürsel TURGUT, Özay ÖZKAYA, Lütfü BAŞ. "Alt Ekstremite Malıgn Melanom Olgularında Nadir Görülen Bir Durum; Popliteal Fossa Metastazı Ve Diseksiyonu; Olgu Sunumu". Turk Plast Surg. Cilt 16, Sayı 3 (2008).
list.pub9: 9. Ayşin Karasoy, Mahmut Ulvi Kayalı, Özay Özkaya, Damlanur Sakız, Lütfü Baş. "Mixed Tubulopapillary Hidroadenoma And Syringocystadenoma Papilliferum Of The Thigh Occuring On Lentiginous Hyperplasia". ŞEEAH Dergisi.

list.section1: September 20-23, 2006 Turkish Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery Congress
list.presentation1: 1. "Application of Human Nail Wrapped in Fascia and Amnion Membrane to Mouse Back: Experimental Study". S. Karşıdağ, M. U. Kayalı, Ö. Özkaya, K. Uğurlu, H. Doğan, A. C. Kaur, U. Tosun, L. Baş
list.presentation2: 2. "Stereolithographic Evaluation of Healing and Shaping in the Nose". S. Tatlıdede, G. Turgut, E. Gönen, M.U. Kayalı, L. Baş.
list.presentation3: 3. "Coverage of Wide Crus and Foot Defects with Cross-Leg Pedicled Combined Latissimus Dorsi and Serratus Anterior Flap - Case Report". Gürsel Turgut, Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Özay Özkaya, Lütfü Baş.
list.presentation4: 4. "Biomechanical Evaluation of Mandibular Fracture Repairs with Bicortical Dual Miniplate in Sheep Jaw". Gürsel Turgut, Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Tufan Soydan, Oğuzhan Gündüz, Serdar Salman, Faik Oktar, Lütfü Baş.
list.presentation5: 5. "Evaluation of Brachial Artery Repairs with Doppler USG". Ayşin Karasoy Yeşilada, Özay Özkaya, Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Ahmet Mesrur Halefoğlu, Evren Şen, Lütfü Baş.
list.presentation6: 6. "Coexistence of Syringocystadenoma Papilliferum and Mixed Papillohidroadenoma Case Report". Ayşin Karasoy Yeşilada, Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Özay Özkaya, Damlanur Sakiz, Lütfü Baş.
list.section2: October 17-20, 2007 28th Turkish Plastic Reconstructive and Aesthetic Surgery Congress
list.presentation7: 1. "Necrotizing Fasciitis and Total Thumb Necrosis in the Forearm Due to Human Bite". Mahmut Kayali, Serdar Bora Bayraktaroğlu, Nebil Yeşiloğlu, Özay Özkaya, Kemal Uğurlu, Lütfü Baş.
list.presentation8: 2. "Use of Interferon Alpha 2B Intralesionally in Keloid Treatment. Gürsel Turgut, Mahmut Kayali, Serdar Bora Bayraktaroğlu, Özay Özkaya, Lütfü Baş
list.presentation9: 3. "Fournier Gangrene Repair with Bilateral Medial Thigh Perforator Flap". Semra Hacikerim Karşidağ, Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Arzu Özcan, Kemalettin Yildiz, Lütfü Baş.
list.presentation10: 4. "Fan Dressing Application Against Maceration in Distant Flaps". Tahsin Görgülü, Gürsel Turgut, Mehmet Köksal, Nebil Yeşiloğlu, Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Lütfü Baş
list.section3: September 15-19, 2010 Trabzon 32nd Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Congress.
list.presentation11: 1. "Our Experience with Free Flap Upper Extremity Reconstruction at Isparta State Hospital During State Service Obligation: 2 Cases". Mahmut Ulvi Kayali, Ufuk Küçük.
